pages.text:
Blue Slime Chickens are very similar to their green ''ancestors''. In fact, they're so similar, there's barely any noticeable difference.
Lay Item: Blue Slimeballs.$(br2)That said, they admittedly are just a tiny bit slower and weaker. Still, one day they hope to take a leap and surpass their green brethren. $(o)As a joke.
